description: Lists all tags for a top-level EFS resource. You must provide the ID of the resource that you want to retrieve the tags for. This operation requires permissions for the elasticfilesystem:DescribeAccessPoints action.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: Specifies the EFS resource you want to retrieve tags for. You can retrieve tags for EFS file systems and access points using this API endpoint.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: An array of the tags for the specified EFS resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The tag key (String). The key can't start with aws:.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag key.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: NextToken is present if the response payload is paginated. You can use NextToken in a subsequent request to fetch the next page of access point descriptions.
